RACE.RACE_TEXT: MOUNTAINEER RACE TRACK AND RACE 1 4 1/2F Dirt CR: 53. Maiden Special Weight Purse 16500. FOR MAIDENS, FILLIES THREE YEARS OLD. Weight, 118 lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: DEL MAR WOMAN dueled inside, won driving. OUT FOR MYSELF dueled outside winner,lost lead late, second best. DON'T LOOK UP stalked leaders three wide, bested others. ORCHARD ROAD no threat. TOP HAT TIGRESS never a factor. ROMANCE PELUSA outrun.

ENTRY.NAME: Out for Myself
ENTRY.COMMENT: dueled outside winner, lost lead late, gamely

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MOUNTAINEER RACE TRACK AND RACE 2 1M Dirt CR: 65. Maiden Special Weight Purse 16500. FOR MAIDENS, THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 116 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: CRYPTIC CODE far back early, commenced rally around the turn, won driving. JOHN'S KID battled for the lead, drew clear, second best. HUNTER JUMPER very wide throughout, gamely, bested others. BLACK BULL never a factor. SHEA D CAPTURE well back early, no bid. SCREAMING JEREMY dueled early, gave way. UNKEMPT tired.

ENTRY.NAME: Cryptic Code
ENTRY.COMMENT: far back early,rallied thru turn, driving

WINNERS_DETAILS.BREEDER: Carol M. Ricker & F. Thomas Conway

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MOUNTAINEER RACE TRACK AND RACE 3 4 1/2F Dirt CR: 76. Claiming Purse 8300. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NOT WON A RACE SINCE NOVEMBER 15, 2022. Three Year Olds, 116 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Claiming Price $4,000 (W V A Bred Races Not Considered In Eligibility).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: ENZOEXPRESS sent for early, lead, drew off around the turn, won driving. SUDDENLY SEDUCTIVE settled back early, rallied strongly along the rail to get place. IMPETUOUS dueled early, weakened late. MAJESTIC SEAS up close early, tired. KOLSCH mild bid, tired. LOVE TWENTY SIX outrun.

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MOUNTAINEER RACE TRACK AND RACE 4 6F Dirt CR: 74. Claiming Purse 8300. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NOT WON A RACE SINCE NOVEMBER 15, 2022. Three Year Olds, 116 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Claiming Price $4,000 (W V A Bred Races Not Considered In Eligibility).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: MALIBU MARLEE trailed early, rallied strongly thru the stretch, driving. BAD KARMA allowed to settle early, took lead in the turn, caught late. MARIPOSA D'ORO led early, weakened late. UNDETECTED no factor. SUGAR BRITCHES no threat. CYBERBURG inside, tired.

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MOUNTAINEER RACE TRACK AND RACE 5 6F Dirt CR: 85. Claiming Purse 7900. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NOT WON A RACE SINCE MAY 15, 2022. Three Year Olds, 116 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Claiming Price $4,000 (W V A Bred Races Not Considered In Eligibility).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: FLATTER ME PLEASE settled midpack early, rallied 4 wide, won driving. PROFESSIONAL dueled early, gamely thru the stretch, held place. FLIMFLAM MAN moved up around the turn, dueled for lead, weakened late. BOATSWAIN settled back early, late rally along the inside. MACHINIST dueled for the early lead, tired. SAINT SCOTTY no factor. NANO up close early, tired. REDACTION outrun while wide.

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MOUNTAINEER RACE TRACK AND RACE 6 4 1/2F Dirt CR: 77. Claiming Purse 8300. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NOT WON TWO RACES SINCE MAY 15, 2022. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since April 15 Allowed 3 lbs. Claiming Price $4,000 (W V A Bred Races Not Considered In Eligibility).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: ALFIE SOLOMONS rushed up inside, drew off, driving. SHIELD OF FAITH rallied for the place. AWESOME OX bid inside thru the stretch, bested others. SOUL OF DISCRETION no factor. SOMERSET BAY vied early, tired.

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MOUNTAINEER RACE TRACK AND RACE 7 1M Dirt CR: 87. Allowance Optional Claiming Purse 23800. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES OTHER THAN MAIDEN, CLAIMING, OR STARTER OR WHICH HAVE NEVER WON FOUR RACES OR CLAIMING PRICE $17,500. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race At A Mile Or Over Since April 15 Allowed 3 lbs. Claiming Price $17,500 (Claiming Races For $15,000 Or Less Not Considered In Estimating Allowances)(W V A Bred Races Not Considered In Eligibility).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: ITSALLABOUTACTION dueled inside rival, took lead late, driving. CANDY ISLAND dueled outside winner, gamely, second best. ADMAA settled, bested others. MAOILIN saved ground, no threat. CHACALOSA outrun.

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MOUNTAINEER RACE TRACK AND RACE 8 5 1/2F Dirt CR: 57. Maiden Claiming Purse 7700. FOR MAIDENS, FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 116 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Claiming Price $4,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: MAMALONA dueled early, driew off, won easily. NYSSA dueled, gamely, second best. STELLAR LEGACY back early, rallied for show. ADRIANA ES BONITA dueled three wide, weakened late. FRANCIA (PER) trailed early, mild bid. COUNTESSOFLOVELACE no threat. JANSELLE outrun. GOT MORE tired.
